Class ClientCommDummy

  • java.lang.Object

    ClientComm

    public class ClientCommDummy
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientComm
    Version:
    1.0 A classe representa os objectos ClientCommDummy, implementado a interface ClientComm, esta é a class que faz a comunicaçao por parte dos clientes com o server
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String serverAddress,
           java.lang.String nickname)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Establish a connection to a Moodish server. This method should be the first one called by the client as no other operation (expect for ClientComm.isConnected()) can be performed before a connection to the server has been established.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ClientComm
        Parameters:
        ServerAddress - nome do server
        nickname - é o nickname do user que se está a connectar Metodo que estabelece a ligaçao, criado a socket que e os canais da mesma
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if a connection cannot be established.

        public boolean isConnected()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Check if currently connected to a host.
        Specified by:
        isConnected in interface ClientComm
        Returns:
        true se a socket nao estiver fechada

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Disconnect from a Moodish server. Any sockets should be closed immediately. Pending messages are not guaranteed to be delivered before disconnecting.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface ClientComm

      • hasNextMessage

        public boolean hasNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Check if a message from the server is pending. If ClientComm.hasNextMessage() returns true, a call to ClientComm.getNextMessage() will return immediately with the oldest message in the queue. If ClientComm.hasNextMessage() returns false, a call to ClientComm.getNextMessage() will block until a message has been received.
        Specified by:
        hasNextMessage in interface ClientComm
        Returns:
        true se a fila de mensagens nao estiver vazia

      • getNextMessage

        public ClientSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Get the next message received from the server. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message has been received. If no message will ever be received (connection is down), null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getNextMessage in interface ClientComm
        Returns:
        ClientSideMessage caso existe alguma mensagem na fila, faz return (FI-FO)

      • sendMoodishMessage

        public void sendMoodishMessage(java.lang.String moodishMessage)
        Description copied from interface: ClientComm
        Send a Moodish message from this client to the server which should then relay the message to all freinds.
        Specified by:
        sendMoodishMessage in interface ClientComm
        Parameters:
        moodishMessage - conteudo da mensagem a enviar
